channel.title: Posts on Susurrate
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Susurrate

item.title: Some options in cloudflare which you can open to accelerate the opening speed of your website.
item.description:
First, go to the dashboard-speed-optimization and you can see all the options there.

What I opened:

  • Auto Minify
    • Javascript
    • CSS
    • HTML
  • Brotli
  • Early Hints

I didn’t open Rocket Loader, because it seems that my hugo theme has some errors with it when loading the left sidebar. You can try it and see whether it works.

That’s all for this, see you next time~ :)

item.title: SJTU reopen!!!
item.description:
SJTU is now gradually reopening!

But only me is left in the dormitory…(I mean, all of my dormmates are not in the domiroty currently)

Anyway, good news!

item.title: My blog is now online

item.title: SJTU is locked down
item.description:
SJTU is suddenly locked down due to the epidemic.

Sad :(

Hope everthing would get better soon.
